chapter.title: Command Abbreviations
chapter.para: Many commands can be called with a shortened version of their proper name.

section.para: + is an abbreviation for SUM.
- is an abbreviation for DIFFERENCE.
/ is an abbreviation for QUOTIENT.
= is an abbreviation for EQUALP.
> is an abbreviation for GREATERP.
< is an abbreviation for LESSP.
* is an abbreviation for PRODUCT.
